messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5989045/diff/2001/doc/code.html File doc/code.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5989045/diff/2001/doc/code.html#newcode303 doc/code.html:303: $GOPATH/bin (or $GOBIN if you've set it; from now "or $GOBIN, if set; to simplify presentation, this document assumes GOBIN is unset"

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=543047268d1a ***

doc/code: mention $GOBIN

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5989045

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

PTAL. On 2012/04/13 22:23:07, adg wrote: http://codereview.appspot.com/5989045/diff/2001/doc/code.html#newcode303 > doc/code.html:303: $GOPATH/bin (or $GOBIN if you've > set it; from now > "or $GOBIN, if set; to simplify presentation, this document assumes GOBIN is > unset" Done.
